name: Crazy Driving
description:
Crazy Driving is a racing game with 6 cars to choose from and 8 big tracks.

You try to beat the lap and race records  and set new ones in every track.

Next time you play you must be faster then the last one.

Getting the 1st place is optional though it can be challenging especially  in open tracks.

No trailer of the game yet. I will create one as soon as possible.

IMPORTANT NOTICE : if you have a game pad you should connect it after the game starts . If your game pad is connected before you run the game it will not work and the game will fail . This is a bug i could not fix.

If you  like  racing games this could be a game for you .
